name: Isekai Crashers
description:
Your profession is a professional Isekai truck driver. Save other world by crashing into protagonists !  Race against the clock every round to hit your quota of protagonist sent to the other world. 
 

Keys: up down left right on keyboard.

This game is my submission to GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam !  With the theme being "Death Is Only The Beginning", I immediately gravitated to the Isekai genre. The trope is how the protagonist perishes in the real world to begin anew in another world.

Issues:

If you do encounter any issues,  you may report below the comments. To keep playing, just restart the game.
